reporter_caption.center: NOEL v. HOME HEALTH 2000, 01-1547 (La.App. 3 Cir. 5/8/02); 816 So.2d 995

caption.center: TEILLA NOEL v. HOME HEALTH 2000, INC.

court.center: Court of Appeal of Louisiana, Third Circuit.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE OFFICE OF WORKERS' COMPENSATION, PARISH OF CALCASIEU, NO. 99-1564, HONORABLE CONSTANCE ABRAHAM-HANDY, WORKERS' COMPENSATION JUDGE.West Page 996
opinion.attorneys:
Robert T. Jacques, Jr., Attorney At Law, Lake Charles, LA, COUNSEL FOR PLAINTIFF/APPELLEE, Teilla L. Noel.
H. Douglas Hunter, Guglielmo, Lopez, Tuttle, Hunter Jarrell, Opelousas, LA, COUNSEL FOR DEFENDANT/APPELLANT, Home Health 2000.
opinion.panel: Court composed of Henry L. Yelverton, John D. Saunders, Jimmie C. Peters, Judges.Page 1
opinion.opinion_text:
For the reasons discussed in Teilla L. Noel v. Home Health 2000,Inc., 01-1543, (La.App. 3 Cir. 5/8/02), 816 So.2d 955, the judgment of the trial court is affirmed. Costs of this appeal are assessed against Home Health Care 2000.
AFFIRMED.
